snippet: A police spokeswoman said the two men, ages 18 and 20, were being questioned, but no charges had been filed in the death of Hadiya Pendleton.
abstract: Chicago police take two men into custody in connection with the shooting death of Hadiya Pendleton on Jan 29.
lead_paragraph: A police spokeswoman said the two men, ages 18 and 20, were being questioned, but no charges had been filed in the death of Hadiya Pendleton.

headline.seo: 2 Men Held in Shooting of Hadiya Pendleton
headline.main: 2 Men Are Held in Shooting Death of Girl in Chicago
headline.print_headline: 2 Men Are Held In Shooting Death Of Girl in Chicago
